description:
Renji`s Zanpakuto Zabimaru, consisting of Monkey and Snake, are irritated over the fact that Byakuya`s Senbonzakura is taking all the credit for their work. Later, a small accident leads to the three Zanpakuto becoming trapped inside the Department of Research and Development`s facility. As they try to find a means to escape, the two Zabimarus find Senbonzakura to be more troublesome than either of them had anticipated.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 幽閉!? 千本桜&蛇尾丸
